text:
e="preserve">Harvey Hodder (1943 – 17 September 2020) was a Canadian politician. Hodder was the Progressive Conservative Member of the House of Assembly (MHA) for the riding of Waterford Valley from 1993 to 2007. From 2003 to 2007, he was the Speaker of the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly.
Hodder died of cancer on 17 September 2020 in Marystown, Newfoundland and Labrador at the age of 77.

annotations.surface_form: Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly
